University of Florida Association for Computing Machinery

UFACM

Welcome to the Association for Computing Machinery Chapter at UF!

Our chapter strives to provide students with valuable resources in addition to those already provided by ACM.

We put on a variety of events and networking opportunities ranging from the Career Development Workshop to Swamphacks.

E-mail us at ufl.acm@gmail.com for any questions.
